General.Name: Nawi Brothers Group Ltd
General.Description: Nawi Brothers Group Ltd provides finance and non-bank credit services in Israel. The company offers import financing, procurement financing, real estate initiative financing, financing suppliers, equipment financing, equity completion finance, funding against commercial checks, and bridging loans. It serves corporations, companies, partnerships, licensed dealers, and businessmen in various industries. The company was formerly known as Golden Equity Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Nawi Brothers Group Ltd in January 2011. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
